games.title: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer party game where players work together on a space ship, but beware as one or more random players among the crew are impostors bent on sabotaging the mission.

games.title: LEGO: Lord of the Rings
games.description: Explore Middle-earth in LEGO form, following the epic storylines of The Lord of the Rings trilogy with the added humor that LEGO games are known for.

games.title: GRID 2
games.description: An immersive racing experience featuring a mix of street, road, and circuit racing across three continents with a variety of licensed vehicles.

games.title: Heroes of Might & Magic III
games.description: A classic turn-based strategy game where players control heroes to explore fantasy landscapes, gather resources, and engage in tactical combat.

games.title: Diplomacy is Not an Option
games.description: A medieval castle siege game where you defend against thousands of angry peasants using strategy, resource management, and a touch of dark humor.

games.title: The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game
games.description: Battle through waves of enemies with honor and skill as your favorite ninjas Lloyd, Nya, Jay, Kai, Cole, Zane and Master Wu to defend Ninjago City.

games.title: HELLDIVERS 2
games.description: A cooperative third-person shooter where players fight against alien threats as elite soldiers, emphasizing teamwork and strategic gameplay.

games.title: Star Wars The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition
games.description: Experience the dark side of the Force as Darth Vader's secret apprentice, with expanded content and alternate storylines exploring the Sith legacy.

games.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim (Special Edition)
games.description: The critically acclaimed role-playing game remastered with all official add-ons, new features like remastered art and effects, and mod support.

games.title: The Escapists 2
games.description: A prison escape simulator where you'll need to craft tools, form alliances, and execute elaborate breakout plans while avoiding the watchful eyes of guards.

games.title: LEGO Star Wars III - The Clone Wars
games.description: Experience the Clone Wars in LEGO form with over 20 story-based missions, 40 bonus levels, and new battle modes featuring ground and space combat.

games.title: Farming Simulator 25
games.description: The latest entry in the popular farming simulation series, featuring new machinery, crops, and enhanced gameplay mechanics for the ultimate agricultural experience.
